characteristics.name: Effect
characteristics.value: Knight Commander Pask can issue an order to a friendly CADIAN LEMAN RUSS at the start of your Shooting phase.  To issue a Tank Order, pick a target LEMAN RUSS within 6" of Knight Commander Pask and choose which order you wish to issue from the Tank Orders table.  Each LEMAN RUSS can only be given a single order each turn.
